page.title: 01Our Area, Kesgrave
page.content: In our area there are lots of private houses, some shops, heathland called Foxhall Heath and also farmland. There is Foxhall Hospital and Foxhall Stadium where motor-cycle speedway races take place. There are some farms; Grange Farm, Kiln Farm, Valley Farm, Monument Farm, Springbank Farm and Lodge Farm. There is a factory and there are some sports grounds. Amongst other things are a water tower, Brookhill Wood, Grange Nurseries, some orchards and a disused hospital. Dukes Hill Wood stretches in a long line like a lane. There are two schools; Kesgrave High School and Kesgrave Heath Primary School. Also present is a landfill site and several ancient tumuli. There are two golf courses. There is also a military radio communications station.
